segments.text: I see the sunlight pouring in through the open window, contrasting the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the kitchen, the garden looks serene and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the woman is oblivious, her focus solely on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of anger as I watch the boy reaching for the cookies, balancing on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s longing gaze towards the cookie jar feels both innocent and conspiratorial.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the adult would take a moment to glance over her shoulder and see what’s really happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
